item.title: Join RStudio Cheatsheets using the pdftools package

item.title: Dabblings in Causal Inference
item.description: Following lecture Causal Inference Lecture 2 Collider Bias library(tidyverse) ## Warning: package 'tidyverse' was built under R version 3.5.3 ## -- Attaching packages --------------------------------------------------------------------- tidyverse 1.2.1 -- ## v ggplot2 3.1.1 v purrr 0.3.2 ## v tibble 2.1.2 v dplyr 0.8.1 ## v tidyr 0.8.3 v stringr 1.4.0 ## v readr 1.3.1 v forcats 0.4.0 ## Warning: package 'ggplot2' was built under R version 3.5.3 ## Warning: package 'tidyr' was built under R version 3.

item.title: Creating this blog
item.description: Nice blogs with the Hugo Academic Theme: * https://pjs-web.de/ * Up and running with blogdown and netlify * AI Institut Wien * Funny dude with glasses * Dude von FitteR HappieR

item.title: Kepler's Peas
item.description: The SETI Institute never stop producing beautiful vistas into space. Following them on twitter [@SETIInstitute](https://twitter.com/SETIInstitute) pays off and led me to gems like the Venus images of the Explorer, Images from the Expolanet Travel Beauro (see above) and lately a link to a new paper Peas in a Pod: Planets in a Kepler Multi-planet System are Similar in Size and Regularly Spaced. The authors produced an inticing data viz {{< tweet 666616452582129664 >}}

The authors produced an inticing data viz {{< tweet 666616452582129664 >}}

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
